text: Servia–Velventos (, Sérvia-Velventós) is a former municipality in the Kozani regional unit, Greece. The seat of the municipality was the town Servia.Kallikratis law Greece Ministry of Interior The municipality has an area of 728.166 km2. ==Municipality== The municipality Servia–Velventos was formed at the 2011 local government reform by the merger of the following 4 former municipalities, that became municipal units: *Kamvounia *Livadero *Servia *Velventos ==References== Category:Municipalities of Western Macedonia Category:Populated places in Kozani (regional unit)
title: Servia-Velventos
